messages.content: I am running a 30 day challenge program where people choose a habit to build and they practice it on a daily basis for 30 days. We also built a bot that sends the participants of the challenge a reminder message each night to check if they completed their challenge. along with that message, we send a little quote to inspire and educate the participants on the importance of sticking to the habit and discipline and not dropping what they signed up to do. We've been heavily relying on quotes from the book Atomic Habits by James Clear because they are some of the best we could find. Note that the program is run for participants in Iraq and the primary language of the program is Arabic. Can you help me generate a quote for each of the reminder messages?

Of course, I'd be happy to help generate some quotes for your reminder messages! Here are a few options, some of which have been translated into Arabic:

1. "Success is a few simple disciplines, practiced every day; while failure is simply a few errors in judgment, repeated every day." - Jim Rohn (النجاح يأتي من عدة عادات بسيطة، يتم ممارستها يومياً، بينما الفشل يأتي بسبب بضعة أخطاء في الحكم والتقييم، تتكرر يومياً).

2. "You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great." - Zig Ziglar (لا يجب أن تكون رائعًا لتبدأ، ولكن يجب أن تبدأ لتصبح رائعًا).

3. "The secret of your success is found in your daily routine." - John C. Maxwell (سر نجاحك يكمن في روتينك اليومي).

4. "Excellence is not a singular act, but a habit. You are what you repeatedly do." - Shaquille O'Neal (التميز ليس عملًا واحدًا، بل هو عادة. أنت تصبح ما تمارسه باستمرار).

5. "Small disciplines repeated with consistency every day lead to great achievements gained slowly over time." - John C. Maxwell (العادات الصغيرة المتكررة بانتظام كل يوم تؤدي إلى إنجازات عظيمة يتم تحقيقها ببطء مع مرور الوقت).

I hope these quotes help inspire and motivate your participants to stick with their habits and achieve their goals!
